p: The results demonstrate that qRT-PCR confirmed 64.8% (59/91) cases for CHIKV. Of those, 79.6% (47/59) had up to seven days after onset of symptoms, 15.2% (9/59) between eight and 15 days after onset of symptoms, 1.6% (1/59) 20 days of disease, 25 days of disease and curiously, 71 days of disease. Among the 59 CHIKV cases confirmed by qRT-PCR, 37.3% (22/59) were randomly selected and quantified, and the viral quantification ranged from 1.07 × 10 0 to 9.51 × 10 0 copies of RNA/μl.
